Click the following link to watch video: https://share.newscasts.refinitiv.com/link?entryId=1_n3wqoxkr&referenceId=1_n3wqoxkr&pageId=RefinitivNewscasts
Source: Reuters

Description: President Biden is convening a meeting of US officials and private sector companies, including FedEx, today to talk about the ongoing efforts to address supply chain disruptions. As countries around the world continue to reimpose restrictions to combat the spread of Omicron, President Biden announced yesterday more federal vaccination and testing sites to tackle a surged in COVID infections. Meanwhile Amazon and its smart-home unit Ring have joined, Meta, Twitter and Pinterest in saying they will no longer be sending teams to the Consumer Electronics Show in Las Vergas over Omicron concerns.
Short Link: https://refini.tv/3pioFmg
